channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: How the Trump administration is boosting stock buybacks
item.description: Gavekal Research predicts more stock repurchases are coming, representing an additional tailwind for the current bull market.

item.title: ‘I thought she was honest’: My ex-wife hid stocks during our divorce. Can I sue her?
item.description: “I have contacted her about it, but she refuses to answer my calls.”

item.title: ‘He’s the breadwinner’: Does my husband take Social Security at 66 — or wait to get $800 extra at 70?
item.description: “My husband jokes that he will never be able to retire because we do not own a home.”

item.title: Morgan Stanley expects Novo Nordisk Alzheimer trial to fail as it slashes rating

item.title: Months after cancer drug trial, Merus agrees to be bought at 41% premium
item.description: Merus agreed to be bought for a 41% premium, months after a positive trial of a cancer drug.
